about_the_game:
You are Hopper, a tin soldier, brought to life by the very evil you are trying to defeat. In this challenging action-adventure you are on a quest to find the mystic crystal “earthlight” to save your country from the evil militant cult "Red Star". Explore vast lands and secret chambers invested with dangerous enemies. In order to succeed you must escape hazards, collect crucial items, and destroy key targets. Unveil hidden secrets along the way that will lead you to the Earthlight crystal’s location before Red Star can find it.

Only your success or failure will determine the Final Nation.

Game Features


  • Forge your path through hostile inter-connected lands comprised of high deserts, mighty fortresses, deadly factories and treacherous caverns deep beneath the Earth.
  • Choose which paths you take all in order to find the crystal “Earthlight”, a crystal with unimaginable capabilities and destructible powers.
  • Destroy Key Targets along the way to slow down Red Stars mining operation
  • Collect ancient artifacts and treasures that offer needed powers and abilities. Use them in your time of need!
  • Avoid being damaged, killed or crushed by hazardous obstacles. Timing is everything.
  • Collect mystical blue crystals you find along your path to regain your health.
  • Fight mighty opponents that will do anything to halt your mission.

    Only your success or failure will determine the Final Nation!
